Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Add granular admin permission system \(RBAC\)

Implement Role-Based Access Control for admin users:

New Models:
- AdminPermission: Individual permission assignments per user
- AdminRole: Predefined role templates \(support_agent, financial_admin, etc.\)
- UserAdminRole: Links users to roles

New API Routes \(/api/admin/permissions\):
- GET /categories - List all permission categories
- GET /my-permissions - Get current user''s permissions
- POST /users/:id/grant - Grant permission to user
- POST /users/:id/revoke - Revoke permission from user
- GET/POST /roles - Manage admin roles
- POST /users/:id/roles - Assign roles to users

Updated Admin Routes:
- admin.py - Uses permission_required decorator
- admin_users.py - Granular user management permissions
- admin_challenges.py - Challenge-specific permissions
- admin_financial.py - Payment/payout permissions
- admin_tickets.py - Support ticket permissions

New Decorators:
- @permission_required\(''perm1'', ''perm2''\) - Require ALL permissions
- @any_permission_required\(''perm1'', ''perm2''\) - Require ANY permission

Default Roles:
- support_agent \(level 1\): Tickets + view users
- content_manager \(level 1\): Blog, webinars, resources
- financial_admin \(level 2\): Payments, payouts, refunds
- admin \(level 5\): Most operations
- superadmin \(level 10\): Full access \(bypasses all checks\)

Migration auto-seeds default roles on startup.

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
